forward_snippets: Recently Adopted Accounting Pronouncements In December 2019, the Financial Accounting Standards Board (“FASB”) issued Accounting Standards Update (“ASU”) 2019-12, which simplifies the accounting for income taxes by removing certain exceptions to the general principles in the existing guidance and making other minor improvements.
The Company adopted this guidance effective October 1, 2021.
The Company adopted this guidance effective October 1, 2021.

The Company adopted this guidance effective October 1, 2021.
